title: The Scott R. Tolbert Law Firm
creator: The Scott R. Tolbert Law Firm

extendedInfo.description: With nearly 20 years experience, The Scott R. Tolbert law firm is a premier Bankruptcy, DUI, Criminal Defense and Domestic/Divorce law firm in the Jackson County/Northeast Georgia area serving clients in need of fast results, experienced representation, close personal attention, and success in the courtroom. Our service is second to none and our competitive rates are guaranteed to attract the interest of potential clients. We pride ourselves in providing detailed information to everyone that calls our office and informing them of exactly what we will be able to do to achieve success in their case.Success in the courtroom is achieved through detailed knowledge of all of the facts and evidence. This requires aggressive representation to ensure that every piece of information is discovered, investigated, and analyzed methodically. Our firm has distinguished itself through a relentless analysis of the facts and circumstances surrounding our clients' cases. We recommend setting up a telephone or in person consultation at the Scott R. Tolbert Firm. Our consultations are free of charge and our advice, counsel, and recommendations are proven to lead to the results that our clients are looking for.
